content: I'm glad you provided so many options. Since I travel frequently, I think I'll focus on the cards with travel-related benefits. I've been taking a lot of flights lately, with 7 flights in the last 9 weeks, and I also take the train often, especially to visit my sister in Philadelphia, which is about a 2-hour ride from my hometown. Do any of these cards offer benefits for train travel or other forms of transportation besides flights?
